metadata.title: CVE-2022-34503 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
QPDF v8.4.2 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow via thefunction QPDF::processXRefStream. This vulnerability allows attackers tocause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted PDF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-34503` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqpdf28 - 10.6.3-1
qpdf - 10.6.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qpdf package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.6.3-1').
